Director: Corinne van der Borch, Tone Grøttjord-Glenne
Synopsis: A coming-of-age story, set in New York, about the metaphorical and literal sisterhood of young athletes Tai, Rainn, and Brooke Sheppard, who excelled on their track and field team while living in a homeless shelter with their single mother, Tonia.
Title: Sisters on Track
